sentences.en: And he's been asked to make a presentation on pre - Columbian art.
sentences.cn: 而且他有被要求作哥伦布发现美洲大陆以前的艺术上的发表.

sentences.en: Columbian emeralds are usually enhanced with fillers.
sentences.cn: 哥伦比亚祖母绿通常是加强与填料.

sentences.en: The most impressive find is the nearly complete skeleton of a huge Columbian mammoth.
sentences.cn: 最震撼的发现是几乎完整的一具大型哥伦比亚猛犸的骨架.

sentences.en: The most impressive find is the nearly complete skeleton of the a huge Columbian mammoth.
sentences.cn: 最令人印象深刻的是近乎完整的哥伦比亚猛犸骨架的发现.

sentences.en: This former place of worship is one of the earliest and best - known pre - Columbian sites.
sentences.cn: 这里的斜坡和广场周围都是石头建筑,伴有大量兽形装饰物,景物别致多姿.

sentences.en: Tom: You know the Columbian girl living upstairs?
sentences.cn: 你知道住楼上的那个哥伦比亚女孩 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 哥伦比亚的；美国的；哥伦布的；美洲的

trans.tran_cn: 美国的，美洲的，哥伦布的
